issue.title: Shop perimeter definition : pan should not delete perimeter
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

In SHOP MAP :
When you define a perimeter, then user the *pan* tool, you loose your perimeter.
It should just... pan.

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

I'am OK pan would just pan. 
But, actually, when you define a perimeter, then pan, then select a perimeter button : your selection is cleared anyway.
So we can correct the pan action (nothing is gonna be cleared), but there is still an inconsistency in the behaviour.
